items.name: Angel's Lament
items.description: A fungus formed of hollow chimneys of shining, golden hue. Smells of wet wool and has a taste akin to intense horseradish, painfully attacking the sinuses.

items.name: Bloodcap
items.description: Dainty little amber-coloured mushrooms with a pointed cap. Their odour is reminiscent of bad blue cheese and they have an oily taste.

items.name: Devil's Grease
items.description: A slime-mould that gathers in cracks in trees. It is jet black in colour, with an aura of ultraviolet. Its odour is like off sausage and it tastes of goose grease.

items.name: Foolscap
items.description: Cream-coloured mushrooms with large, floppy caps, flecked with orange. Smell distinctly of cloves and taste earthy.

items.name: Goatman's Goblet
items.description: Miniature, orange, goblet-shaped fungi that sprout from fuzzy patches on rotting wood. Smell of goat's milk and taste like blood.

items.name: Grinning Jenny
items.description: Drab, olive capped toadstools whose rims tend to curl up like leering grins.

items.name: Hob's Lewd
items.description: Towering, horn-like nodules of slimy black fungus. The slime, if collected when fresh, is sweet-tasting and highly psychoactive.

items.name: Lambent Stinkhorn
items.description: 8â€³ fungi with a long, fleshy stem topped with a pink, lattice-like veil. Reek of stale urine but are virtually flavourless. In darkness, lambent stinkhorns produce a faint, blue luminescence.

items.name: Lover's Gasp
items.description: Tiny pink mushrooms with delicate, pointed caps and long, stringy stems. Have a faintly floral odour and taste of sand.

items.name: Mawbarg's Jam
items.description: A frothy, grey sludge that reeks of awful cheese and tastes worse.

items.name: Mossmulch
items.description: Dark green, drooping fungi covered in seaweed-like tendrils.

items.name: Mottlecap
items.description: Wide-capped toadstools of mottled green/brown colouration. Have an unpleasant odour akin to cat's urine.

items.name: Numblings
items.description: Slimy, scarlet fungus bearing an eerie resemblance to various bodily organs, including brain, heart, eyeball, tongue, finger, nose.

items.name: Puck's Ear
items.description: Glistening black, ear-shaped fungi that grow on bark. Smell of vinegar but taste fruity.

items.name: Purple Nightcap
items.description: A deep purple fungus with long stems and tiny button caps. Smells of milk and has a yeasty flavour.

items.name: Rotting Mazegill
items.description: Densely packed balls of fibres that appear to be of purple or orange hue, depending on the viewing angle. The fungi smell of rotten parsnips and taste of lime sorbet.

items.name: Shaggy Sage
items.description: A tiny, yellow fungus that grows in frothing clumps. Reeks of pungent spice and tastes of aniseed.

items.name: Speckled Sporange
items.description: White puffballs, flecked with gold. Odourless, but have a very strong citrus flavour.

items.name: Velvet Flounder
items.description: Luxuriant, purple mushrooms covered in swirling crimson patterns.

items.name: Witch's Purple
items.description: Big, floppy bracket fungus of deep purple hue and woody consistency. The fungi smell of fine wine and taste of aniseed.
